PPLoc: http://www.polyone.com/Pages/PrivacyPolicy.aspx; Employees may view full text of privacy policy by consulting with their local HR representative or by accessing the Company's Intranet site.
activities: PolyOne will develop and maintain a centralized database, maintained by PolyOne in the United States, containing personal information about employees who work at PolyOne's subsidiaries and branches located in the EU.  From time-to-time, the Company may also obtain personal information relating to customers and suppliers.
eucountries: Belgium, Czech Republic, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Poland, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-Line, Manually Processed, Human Resources Data
